cedar.processing.steps.Convolution.name: Convolution 2
cedar.processing.steps.Convolution.comments: for size changes, agent size might not match transient exactly so enlarge agent size

cedar.processing.steps.Convolution.comments: for size changes, agent size might not match transient exactly so enlarge agent size

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments: hand size changed then pushed

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments: hand size changed then pushed

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: GRASP 2

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: GRASP 3
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments: hand size changed then pulled

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: TRANSPORT 3
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments: when hand movement is detected

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: agent moved
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]

1 transient
1 agent
sum 2

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: agent moved 2
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]

1 transient
1 agent
sum 2

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: size change grasp/drop
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
4 grasp/drop
2normalized size change

[regime]
 sustained if grasp/drop is on

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: size change grasp/drop 2
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
4 grasp/drop
2normalized size change

[regime]
 sustained if grasp/drop is on

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: size changed then pull
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
+4 grasp
+1 a not b
+1 b

[regime]
sustained as long as grasp is on

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: size changed then pull 2
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
+4 grasp
+1 a not b
+1 b

[regime]
sustained as long as grasp is on

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
+4 grasp
+1 a not b
+1 b

[regime]
sustained as long as grasp is on

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: size changed then push 2

+1 a not b
+1 b

[regime]

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: terminate drop
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
+4 grasp
+1 size changed then pulled
+1 pulled object no movement

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: terminate drop 2
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
+4 grasp
+1 size changed then pulled
+1 pulled object no movement

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: terminate grasp
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:

+4 grasp
+1 size changed then pulled
+1 pulled object no movement

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: terminate grasp 2
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
+4 grasp
+1 size changed then pulled
+1 pulled object no movement

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: terminate move_to
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
+4 verb move_to
+1 tool moved
+1 no tool movement
+1 ref obj found

tool moved then (there is no movement and there exists a reference object)

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: terminate move_to 2
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[input]
+4 verb move_to
+1 tool moved
+1 no tool movement
+1 ref obj found

tool moved then (there is no movement and there exists a reference object)

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: tool moved
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
they do not have to be WM, can also decay slow enough so that b node is on before decay

[input]
+1.5 move_to
+4 agent moved

[regime]
sustained as long as move_to is on

slower than no movement to allow it enough time to die out

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: tool moved 2
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
they do not have to be WM, can also decay slow enough so that b node is on before decay

[input]
+1.5 move_to
+4 agent moved

[regime]
sustained as long as move_to is on

slower than no movement to allow it enough time to die out

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: w size change
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments: WM of size change

ui.text: V1: size change activates grasp or drop
V2: size change do not activate any verbs
